subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Joe Flacco was sharp in his preseason debut, and a revamped Baltimore defense forced four turnovers in the Ravens’ 44-16 victory over the host Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
snippet: Joe Flacco was sharp in his preseason debut, and a revamped Baltimore defense forced four turnovers in the Ravens’ 44-16 victory over the host Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
